Subskills.name: Cut In Half
Subskills.description: Increases the damage of slicing throw.

Subskills.name: Precision Blade
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using slicing throw.

Subskills.name: Splitting blade
Subskills.description: Slicing throw splits into multiple orbiting blades spiraling outwards and returning to the initial location.

Subskills.name: One Swift Strike
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage and projectile speed of slicing throw.

Subskills.name: Cuts and Wounds
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Splitting Chain
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional chaining blade on hit.

Subskills.name: Burn the Corpses
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Bladestorm
Subskills.description: Increases the size and spinning speed of slicing throw.

Subskills.name: Daisy's Regards
Subskills.description: Slicing throw explodes into a fiery pentagram inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Executioner's Apprentice
Subskills.description: Slicing throw executes monsters below a threshold.

Subskills.name: Daisy's Insight
Subskills.description: Reduced the cooldown of slicing throw.

Subskills.name: Bloody Combustion
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a ripple of blood from burning monsters on hit dealing additional damage based on target life.

Subskills.name: Slicing Vortex
Subskills.description: Slicing throw now orbits you with increased projectile speed and increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bladesaw Massacre
Subskills.description: Throw multiple blades forming a huge chainsaw that can be controlled. Slicing throw cooldown is now increased.
